
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52324051">
<font size="5">亲爱的家长们，《益智宝贝》第262集中，<img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""></font><br>
<font size="5">带领孩子们探索有趣的知识世界，激发他们的思维能力和创造力！</font><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_IASZD" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1738664530049_d7fb45e7fb3d5.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1738664530049_d7fb45e7fb3d5.jpg"><br>

<img id="aimg_zD1M1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/搜图神器_1738664673450_1c0d87880b4a1.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/搜图神器_1738664673450_1c0d87880b4a1.png"><br>
<br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000"> </font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">**动画亮点**：</font></font><br>
<font size="4">- **趣味互动**：通过互动游戏，让孩子在玩乐中轻松学习，培养他们的观察力和逻辑思维。</font><br>
<font size="4">- **科学小实验**：简单易行的科学实验，激发孩子们的求知欲，培养他们的小小科学家精神。</font><br>
<font size="4">- **语言启蒙**：丰富的故事和儿歌，帮助孩子们提高语言表达能力，增强记忆力。</font><br>
<font size="4"><br>
</font><br>
